mapper.select: SELECT share_info.fileID AS fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,fileName,fileSize,fileType,share_info.operator AS operator,cloud_disk_user.userName AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate AS createDate FROM share_info,file_info,cloud_disk_user WHERE share_info.operator=#{operator} AND share_info.fileID=file_info.fileID AND file_info.fileState='normal' AND share_info.shareObjectID=cloud_disk_user.userID UNION SELECT share_info.fileID AS fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,fileName,fileSize,fileType,share_info.operator AS operator,group_info.groupName AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate AS createDate FROM share_info,file_info,group_info WHERE share_info.operator=#{operator} AND share_info.fileID=file_info.fileID AND file_info.fileState='normal' AND share_info.shareObjectID=group_info.groupID UNION SELECT share_info.fileID AS fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,folderName AS fileName,'' AS fileSize,'文件夹' AS fileType,share_info.operator AS operator,cloud_disk_user.userName AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate AS createDate FROM share_info,folder_info,cloud_disk_user WHERE share_info.operator=#{operator} AND share_info.fileID=folder_info.folderID AND folder_info.folderState='normal' AND share_info.shareObjectID=cloud_disk_user.userID UNION SELECT share_info.fileID AS fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,folderName AS fileName,'' AS fileSize,'文件夹' AS fileType,share_info.operator AS operator,group_info.groupName AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate AS createDate FROM share_info,folder_info,group_info WHERE share_info.operator=#{operator} AND share_info.fileID=folder_info.folderID AND folder_info.folderState='normal' AND share_info.shareObjectID=group_info.groupID

select share_info.fileID as fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,fileName,fileSize,fileType,share_info.operator as operator,cloud_disk_user.userName AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate as createDate from share_info,file_info,cloud_disk_user where shareObjectID=#{shareObjectID} and share_info.operator!=#{operator} and shareObjectID=cloud_disk_user.userID and share_info.fileID=file_info.fileID and file_info.fileState='normal' union SELECT share_info.fileID as fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,folderName as fileName,'' as fileSize,'文件夹' AS fileType,share_info.operator as operator,cloud_disk_user.userName AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate as createDate FROM share_info,folder_info,cloud_disk_user WHERE shareObjectID=#{shareObjectID} AND share_info.operator!=#{operator} AND shareObjectID=cloud_disk_user.userID AND share_info.fileID=folder_info.folderID and folder_info.folderState='normal' union SELECT share_info.fileID AS fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,fileName,fileSize,fileType,share_info.operator as operator,group_info.groupName as shareObjectName,share_info.createDate as createDate FROM share_info,file_info,group_info WHERE shareObjectID IN (SELECT groupID FROM group_member_info WHERE userID=#{shareObjectID}) and share_info.operator!=#{operator} AND shareObjectID=group_info.groupID and share_info.fileID=file_info.fileID and file_info.fileState='normal' UNION SELECT share_info.fileID AS fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,folderName AS fileName,'' as fileSize,'文件夹' as fileType,share_info.operator AS operator,group_info.groupName as shareObjectName,share_info.createDate AS createDate FROM share_info,folder_info,group_info WHERE shareObjectID in (SELECT groupID FROM group_member_info WHERE userID=#{shareObjectID}) AND share_info.operator!=#{operator} AND shareObjectID=group_info.groupID and share_info.fileID=folder_info.folderID and folder_info.folderState='normal'

select folderID as fileID,folderName as fileName,'' as fileSize,'文件夹' as fileType from folder_info where folderID in ( select childrenFolderID from folder_info,folder_relation where folder_info.folderID=#{folderID} and folder_info.folderID=folder_relation.parentFolderID) and folderState='normal' union select fileID as fileID,fileName as fileName,fileSize,fileType from file_info where fileID in ( select childrenFolderID from folder_info,folder_relation where folder_info.folderID=#{folderID} and folder_info.folderID=folder_relation.parentFolderID) and fileState='normal'

SELECT folderID AS fileID,folderName AS fileName,'' AS fileSize,'文件夹' AS fileType FROM folder_info WHERE folderID IN (SELECT childrenFolderID FROM folder_relation WHERE parentFolderID =(SELECT parentFolderID FROM folder_relation WHERE folder_relation.childrenFolderID=#{folderID})) AND folderState='normal' UNION SELECT fileID AS fileID,fileName AS fileName,fileSize,fileType FROM file_info WHERE fileID IN (SELECT childrenFolderID FROM folder_relation WHERE parentFolderID =(SELECT parentFolderID FROM folder_relation WHERE folder_relation.childrenFolderID=#{folderID})) AND fileState='normal'

select share_info.fileID as fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,fileName,fileSize,fileType,share_info.operator as operator,'所有人' AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate as createDate from share_info,file_info where shareObjectID='all' and share_info.fileID=file_info.fileID and file_info.fileState='normal' union SELECT share_info.fileID as fileID,share_info.shareObjectID as shareObjectID,folderName as fileName,'' as fileSize,'文件夹' AS fileType,share_info.operator as operator,'所有人' AS shareObjectName,share_info.createDate as createDate FROM share_info,folder_info WHERE shareObjectID='all' and share_info.fileID=folder_info.folderID and folder_info.folderState='normal'

select userID as shareObjectID,userName as shareObjectName from cloud_disk_user where userID!=#{shareObjectID} union select group_info.groupID as shareObjectID,groupName as shareObjectName from group_info,group_member_info where userID=#{shareObjectID} and group_member_info.groupID=group_info.groupID union select 'all' as shareObjectID,'所有人' as shareObjectName
